assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Oregon Pacific Bancorp operates as the bank holding company for Oregon Pacific Banking Company that provides various banking products and services to individual and business customers in the United States. The company's deposit products include checking, savings, money market, and time deposit accounts. It also provides mortgage loans; real estate construction loans; commercial loans, including operating lines of credit, equipment, accounts receivable, and inventory financing; and commercial real estate loans for the construction, purchasing, and refinancing of commercial and rental properties. In addition, the company offers secured and unsecured personal loans, home equity and personal lines of credit, and motor vehicle loans, as well as debit cards. Further, it provides trust and asset management services; and other services, including safe deposit boxes, letters of credit, travelers' checks, direct deposit of payroll, social security and dividend payments, and automatic payment of insurance premiums and mortgage loans, as well as online and mobile banking, and overdraft protection services. It operates through full-service branches in Florence, Eugene, Coos Bay, Roseburg, and Medford; and offers trust services in Florence, Coos Bay, Medford, and Eugene. Oregon Pacific Bancorp was founded in 1979 and is headquartered in Florence, Oregon.
